sections.heading: of an act entitled "An act granting relief, in certain cases, against collusive judgments and wrongful alienations of lands" , passed March 2, 1798 [Rev
sections.text: 1877, p. 1409, s. 12 (C. S. p. 1526, s. 12) ] saved from repeal. [This section permits certain persons to appeal from certain collusive judgments.
